Bug Description: The axis of the slingshot is not axed
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Touch the slingshot with the alien 3. The slingshot rolls
Actual result: The axis is not blocked
Expected result: The slingshot should have a fixed axis
How to fix(if known): Block the axis of the slingshot

Bug Description: The slingshot can jump in the air
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over the slingshot 2. Use the capabilities of the slingshot 3. Use it again in the air
Actual result: The slingshot can make multiple jumps
Expected result: The slingshot needs to be fixed on the ground to jump
How to fix(if known): The slingshot can make multiple jumps in the air

Bug Description: Remove the slow-motion when you get out of the slingshot
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over the slingshot. 2. Get out of it while you are in the air
Actual result: The player keep being slowed down when he gets out of the slingshot in the air
Expected result: When you get out of the worm the state of the parasite is reset
How to fix(if known): The slow-motion should disappear when you get out of the worm

Bug Description: Die when a "barrel" touch you when you take over an alien
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Touch a barrel
Actual result: The player dies when he touches a barrel. However he doesn't if he touches one while he is an alien
Expected result: The barrel can kill whoever the player is controlling
How to fix(if known): Apply a "restart level" when the barrel touches the player

Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Jump right under the ceilling 3. Get out of the alien 4. You pass through the ceilling
Actual result: when you get out of the alien you are on top of it. if you are exactly under the ceilling you can pass through it
Expected result: The parasite needs to get out of the alien exactly in the middle of the alien
How to fix(if known): Change the spawning point of the parasite

Bug Description: Screen resolutions and ratios alter the behavior of the game
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Try to jump
Actual result: The game doesn't work properly on some screen resolutions and ratios. Some jumps are impossible on bigger screens
Expected result: Every screen and resolution should not alter the behavior of the camera
How to fix(if known): Need to apply a fixed resolution and ratio

Bug Description: Screen resolutions and ratios change the camera
Steps to reproduce: 1. Enter a level
Actual result: The camera is too close to the player on big screens while it is too far on small screens
Expected result: Every screen and resolution should not alter the behavior of the camera
How to fix(if known): Need to apply a fixed resolution and ratio

Bug Description: Building the game in release mode removes the ability to preview
Steps to reproduce: 1. Build the game in release mode. 2. Take over an alien. 3. Try to use an ability
Actual result: The ability preview is not shown because we use a debug function
Expected result: The preview should also be shown when the game is built in release mode
How to fix(if known): Need to make a custom preview function

Bug Description: Non-played aliens can make the player die
Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over an alien 2. Get out of it on the barrel's way 3. The barrel kills the player if it touches the alien
Actual result: The barrel can kill the player even if it doesn't touch the player
Expected result: The barrel should just destroy the alien and not restart the level
How to fix(if known): Make a switch in the barrel blueprint to check if the player is controlling the alien and so restart the level

Bug Description: The player can take over an alien in a place not intended to
Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the first level. 2. Jump over the laser and reach the "jumper"
Actual result: The alien is too close
Expected result: The alien should not be accesible for the player
How to fix(if known): Add a collider in front of the alien/Move the alien further

Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over a slime 2. Jump on the corner of a yellow box 3. Try to jump
Actual result: The player can be stuck in the corner of a yellow box when he is a slime
Expected result: The box should just let the player slide and not affect it in any way
How to fix(if known): Check the collider of the slime and the yellow box

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the game with the menu as the first "level" 2. Take over an alien 3. Try to get out of it
Actual result: Starting the game with the menu break the shot preview
Expected result: The thrown preview should not be modified by the menu
How to fix(if known): The menu make the game in a "UI" state

Steps to reproduce: 1. Take over the "jumper" 2. You have a gap between the ground and the jumper
Actual result: The alien is not fixed on the ground
Expected result: The alien should be fixed to the ground
How to fix(if known): Fix the collider of the jumper

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the second level 2. Reach the void 3. Jump in the void
Actual result: The player can fall infinitely and will never die
Expected result: The level should be restart after falling
How to fix(if known): Add a collider on the void that will restart the level

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the second level 2. Reach the part with the saw 3. Jump on them
Actual result: The player can pass through them and fall into the void below
Expected result: The level should be restart after touching a saw
How to fix(if known): Fix the collider of the saw/add a destroy entity on it

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the first level 2. Reach the laser section 3. Go in the laser when it is off
Actual result: The player is not dead when an off laser turn on
Expected result: The laser should be a trigger and not a collider
How to fix(if known): Put the blueprint in "overlap"

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with 2 different aliens 2. Take over one of them 3. Jump on the other one 4. Get out of the first one while you are on the second one 5. Try to take over the 2nd one
Actual result: The player can sof-lock the game unintentionally
Expected result: The aliens should ignore each other colliders
How to fix(if known): Check if all the aliens have a coherent collider and if they are fixed on the axis

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a jumper 2. Take over the jumper 3. Try to go between 2 sets of boxes with 1 cube width between them 4. Try to get out of the jumper
Actual result: The preview is not shown when you are in the middle of the boxes
Expected result: The player should be able to see a preview of the jump/throw
How to fix(if known): Change the starting point of the preview

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a jumper and a laser 2. Take over the jumper 3. Jump on the laser's path 4. Get out of the jumper
Actual result: A laser cannot kill a jumper
Expected result: The laser should kill the jumper
How to fix(if known): Change the blueprint of the laser to kill aliens unposessed

Bug Description: Collision between the slingshot and the parasite
Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a slingshot 2. Take over the slingshot 3. Launch the slingshot in the air 4. Get out of the slingshot in the direction of the ground when you almost touch it
Actual result: The parasite will spin infinitely in the ground and will never die
Expected result: The parasite should not be stuck in the ground
How to fix(if known): Change the starting point of the slingshot

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a small ramp (level 1) 2. Put the parasite in front of a rising ramp 3. Move the parasite forward
Actual result: The parasite will not be able to climb the ramp
Expected result: Any collider should not block the parasite
How to fix(if known): Change the collider of the ramp

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start the first level 2. Take over the jumper 3. Try to throw out of the jumper
Actual result: The preview is not shown when you take over a jumper for the first time
Expected result: The throw preview needs to always be displayed
How to fix(if known): Change the Y axis of the preview

Steps to reproduce: 1.Place a graffity(keystrokes tutorial) in a level 2. Jump on it
Actual result: The player can jump on the graffity because there is a collier
Expected result: The graffities are only for decoration
How to fix(if known): Remove the collider of the graffity

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with yellow boxes 2. Use the parasite 3. Drop on the corner of a yellow box
Actual result: The parasite can pass through the background wall
Expected result: Touching a collider should not change the Y axis of a character
How to fix(if known): Change the collider of the yellow box/Fix the Y axis of the parasite

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a slingshot 2. Try to control the slingshot
Actual result: You cannot control the slingshot or get out of it
Expected result: The player should be able to move the character
How to fix(if known): Add controls related to the slingshot

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a grappler 2. Take over the grappler 3. Use the grappling hook on a surface 4. Try to remove the hook from the surface
Actual result: You cannot remove the hook from the surface which restrict the player's movement
Expected result: The player should be able to remove the hook from a wall
How to fix(if known): Add a button to remove the hook from the surface

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a grappler 2. Take over the grappler 3. Use the grappling hook on an aerial surface 4. Try to use it on another aerial surface 5. You can grab the opposite way
Actual result: The grappling hook can sometimes be not precise and will not attach to the right surface
Expected result: The grappling hook needs to shoot where the player is aiming
How to fix(if known): Change the detection system of the grappling hook

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a grappler 2. Take over the grappler 3. Use the grappling hook on any surface 4. Try to throw out of the grappler while you are hooked
Actual result: You cannot throw out of the grappler while you are hooked and since you can't remove the hook you are stuck
Expected result: The player needs to have a way to get out of the grappler he is when hooked to a surface
How to fix(if known): Add a way to remove the hook from a surface

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a grappler 2. Take over it 3. Try to throw out of it
Actual result: You cannot throw out of the grappler
Expected result: The player should be able to get out of the grappler
How to fix(if known): Add the already existing script to throw out of the alien

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a slingshot 2. Take over the slingshot 3. Overlap the slingshot with another alien 4. Try to jump with the slingshot
Actual result: The preview is not shown because it is stuck in the alien
Expected result: The preview should not take into account the alien
How to fix(if known): Change the Y axis of the preview

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with an alien 2. Take over it 3. Overlap the alien with another one 4. Try to throw out of the alien
Actual result: The throw preview is not shown because it is stuck in the alien
Expected result: The preview should not take into account the alien
How to fix(if known): Change the axis of the throw preview

Steps to reproduce: 1. Start a level with a slingshot and with black and white boxes 2. Take over the slingshot 3. Jump on the corner of a black box
Actual result: You can jump again and you are stuck in the wall
Expected result: Player's movements should not be limited by a collider
How to fix(if known): Change the collider of the black box
